amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to require regional foresters to submit a plan through the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program for the treatment and removal of trees killed by or infested with bark beetles in Western states.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
